short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official extension for www.quotser.com. Save quotes directly from the browser or import from Kindle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official chrome extension for Quotser, where you can keep, share, discover and rediscover your favorite quotes!

This is a very minimal extension that supports the following features:

- Import quote from selection.
- Import highlights from Kindle.
